wikipedia_page.main: Denise Marston-Smith (born 1977) is a female former English field hockey international, who was a member of the England and Great Britain women's field hockey team. She represented England and won a silver medal, at the 1998 Commonwealth Games in Kuala Lumpur. As of 2007 she played for Olton & West Warwickshire Hockey Club.
